headline: The Bull Case For Uber Technologies (UBER) Could Change Following Nationwide Kroger Grocery Rollout Onto Uber Apps
summary: In mid-January 2026, Uber Technologies and The Kroger Co. rolled out nearly 2,700 Kroger Family of Companies stores onto the Uber Eats, Uber, and Postmates apps, giving customers nationwide access to full-store grocery assortments with on-demand and same-day delivery. This expansion deepens Uber’s presence in grocery delivery while reinforcing its role as a broader everyday shopping platform rather than only a restaurant marketplace. headline: 3 Large-Cap Stocks We Keep Off Our Radar
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.
